concept.title: Business Rules Summary
concept.shortdesc: View a list of business rules that your organization manages from the Business Rules page.

conbody.p: The security and web access rights assigned to your role determines the business rules that appear on this page. In addition, business rules are also determined by the features implemented by your organization.
Information for business rules that displays on the Business Rules page includes:

ul.li: Business rule access (define, modify, or view)

conbody.p: Some business rules can only be viewed as they are system-delivered. Others can be modified and others can be created new and have business rule entries defined for the business rule.

Users can add a custom business rule for your organization by selecting the Add Business Rule from the Action drop-down list. Users must have applicable permission to this function based on security settings for Web Access rights.
